column2: Encompass Health Corp. engages in providing post-acute healthcare services. The company is headquartered in Birmingham, Alabama and currently employs 30,060 full-time employees. The firm manages its operations through segments, including inpatient rehabilitation, and home health and hospice. The company is an owner and operator of inpatient rehabilitation hospitals. The company provides specialized rehabilitative treatment on both an inpatient and outpatient basis. The company offers its home health and hospice services through Encompass Home Health and Hospice business (Encompass). Encompass operates home health and hospice agencies in 30 states, with concentrations in the Southeast, Oklahoma, and Texas. As of December 31, 2018, the Company operated 130 inpatient rehabilitation hospitals.
